title.rendered: US Diversity Visa Lottery Program 2025 | How To Apply

content.rendered:
The US Diversity Visa Lottery (DV-2025) program’s website, maintained by the State Department, is now active. Interested individuals can submit their applications to enter the lottery or verify their admission status if they have already applied. We have provided comprehensive instructions on applying for and potentially securing a spot in the US Visa Lottery DV-2025.

Every year, the Department of State carries out a random selection process for Diversity Immigrant Visa (DV) applicants, drawing from all the entries that have been registered. The selection is based on allocating available visas for each region and country. It is crucial to stay informed about the entry submission deadline so that you can prepare and apply in a timely manner. The entry form will only be accessible for submission during the designated application period. Entries sent via the United States Postal Service will not be accepted.

Eligibility Requirements for the 2025 US Diversity Visa Lottery

To be eligible to participate in the US electronic diversity visa lottery, interested individuals must meet the following criteria:

Requirements (1)

Individuals born in countries whose natives qualify for entry may be eligible. If you were not born in an eligible country, you may be able to qualify in one of two ways.

  • Was your spouse born in a country whose citizens qualify? If yes, you can claim your spouse’s country of birth if both of you are named on the selected entry, are found eligible and issued diversity visas, and enter the United States simultaneously.
  • Were you born in a country where natives are ineligible but neither of your parents were born or were legally residents at the time of your birth? If yes, you may claim one of your parents’ countries of birth if it is a country whose natives are eligible for the DV 2025 program.
Requirements (2)

Each DV applicant must meet the DV program’s education or work experience requirement by having either:

  • A high school diploma or its equivalent is defined as successful completion of a 12-year course of formal elementary and secondary education
  • Two years of work experience within the past five years in an occupation requiring at least two years of training or experience to perform. To determine qualifying work experience, the Department of State will consult the US Department of Labor’s O*Net Online database.

Timeline for the selection process.

A must-read for valuable information! If you intend to apply for the US Diversity Visa Lottery in 2025, keep the following points in mind:

  • The Department of State will randomly select individuals from among qualified entries based on the allocations of available visas in each region and country.
  • To determine if your entry has been selected in the program, all diversity visa lottery (DV-2025) entrants must go to the Entrant Status Check using the unique confirmation number saved from your online entry registration.
  • If your entry is chosen, you will be directed to a confirmation page with additional instructions. This includes information about immigration fees to the United States.
  • The Department of State will only notify selectees of their selection for DV-2025 via Entrant Status Check.
  • The Department of State will not mail or email notification letters to selectees. The United States’ embassies and consulates will not list those chosen.
  • Individuals who have not been chosen will only be notified via the Entrant Status Check on the E-DV website.
  • You are strongly encouraged to check your entrant status.
  • Someone else will keep you in check if you don’t keep someone else in check.

How to Apply for the Diversity Visa Lottery Program in the United States.

The diversity visa lottery (DV-2025) is only available online. To apply,

  • To begin registration, go to the Department of State’s website.
  • To begin the application process, click the begin entry.
  • Fill in all required fields and upload all required documents.
  • Check the application instruction page as well to study the application procedure thoroughly.

Additional Information on the US Diversity Visa Lottery 2025

To be able to immigrate;

  • DV candidates must be eligible to enter the United States.
  • The DS-260, Online Immigrant Visa and Alien Registration Application is completed electronically. The consular officer will interview you to determine your immigration eligibility under US law, including questions about criminal and security issues.
  • After this date, the Department of State cannot issue DVs, USCIS approve adjustments, or family members obtain DVs to follow to join the principal applicant in the United States.
  • The Department of State will not mail or email notification letters to selectees. The United States’ embassies and consulates will not list those chosen.
  • The ONLY way for the Department of State to notify selectees of their selection is through the Entrant Status Check on the E-DV website.

The application portal is open from October 4 to November 7, 2024.
